name: Straw Journey
description:
Ludum Dare Submission Page : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/charitable-duffy

Seek the greatest treasure of your era with a bunch of drunks! (definitely not a one piece spinoff)
How to play? - Your crew is going to have needs and, as their captain, you need to keep them alive until the last island. - Use your hand/gun to collect items and give them to your crew. - Loot islands through your journey. - If the game is too hard for you, you can use Cheat Button to spawn the last island. Controls: Right Click - Aim Left Click - Shoot A-D - Move Space - Interact/Carry/Use -Cheat- Spawn Laugh Tale -> Page Up
